```
CREATE TABLE company (
    company_name text,
    employee_name text,
    employee_email text,
    employee_age int,
    PRIMARY KEY ((company_name), employee_email)
);
```

```
CREATE TABLE company_by_employee_age_idx ( 
    employee_age int,
    company_name text,
    employee_email text,
    PRIMARY KEY ((employee_age), company_name, employee_email) 
);
```
